StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetThreeYearSMCRReserveUnitContracts]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int, @FiscalYear int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
-- Get the withdrawn NWAs so the withdrawn contracts can be excluded CREATE TABLE #Withdrawals(NWA_ID int) Insert into #Withdrawals Exec [MCRISS].[USMC].[GetWithdrawnNWAs];
SELECT dis.nct n.rowguid AS NwaRowGuid, mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AS MarineCandidateId, (P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME) AS CandidateName, contract_begin_Date AS ContractBeginDate, n.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE AS O.cerComponentCode, n.nwa_id AS NwaId, n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID AS OrgId, hs.rowguid AS SchoolGuid, hs.highschool_name AS CollegeName, n.Mission_Year_Work_For AS MissionYearOfContract, cpro.[CollegePro.leID], smcr.[SMCRReserveUnitID], smcr.[Organiza.onID], smcr.[FiscalYear] INTO #ALLCandidateInfo FROM MARINE_CANDIDATE mc inner join NWA n on n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID =mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID inner join OCS O ON O.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID AND O.DROP_REASON IS NULL inner join OCS_CLASS OC ON OC.CLASS_ID = O.OCS_CLASS_ID inner join CANDIDATE_EDUCATION ce ON ce.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID =mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID
inner join CANDIDATE_ADDRESS ca ON ca.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID -- join for address and ca.ADDRESS_TYPE = 'H'
inner join GEO_LOCATION gl ON gl.CITY_CODE = ca.CITY_CODE AND gl.COUNTY_CODE = ca.COUNTY_CODE AND gl.STATE_CODE = ca.STATE_CODE
inner join CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE ct ON ct.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = ca.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID -- join for telephone and ct.TELEPHONE_TYPE ='C' -- current telephone
inner join PERSON p ON P.PERSON_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID -- join for last and .rst name
INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OFC ON OFC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID
Le. Outer join USMC.CandidatePoolCardInfo cp ON cp.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID
INNER JOIN dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs ON CE.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND hs.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = @Organiza.onID
INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] cpro ON cpro.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND cpro.[FiscalYear] = @FiscalYear
INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.leSMCRReserveUnit] cpsmcr ON cpsmcr.[CollegePro.leID] = cpro.[CollegePro.leID]
INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[SMCRReserveUnit] smcr ON smcr.[SMCRReserveUnitID] = cpsmcr.[SMCRReserveUnitID] AND smcr.[Organiza.onID] = @Organiza.onID AND smcr.[FiscalYear] = @FiscalYear
WHERE (n.Mission_Year_Work_For in (@FiscalYear, @FiscalYear - 1, @FiscalYear - 2, @FiscalYear - 3)) -- get the mission year, and the three previous mission years AND -- retrieve only PLC and OCC candidates N.[OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE] IN ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '1A', '1B', '1C', '1H','1E') AND -- only get candidates that have the same Organiza.on as the school N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = hs.ORGANIZATION_ID -- exclude withdrawn NWAs AND N.NWA_ID not in (SELECT NWA_ID FROM #Withdrawals)
--NON-RESERVIST MINUS DUPLICATE NWA'S FOR THE SAME CANIDATE SELECT * INTO #FilteredCandidateInfo FROM #ALLCandidateInfo ac1 WHERE O.cerComponentCode IN ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '1A', '1B', '1C', '1H') AND ac1.ContractBeginDate = (SELECT MIN(ContractBeginDate) FROM #ALLCandidateInfo ac2 WHERE ac2.O.cerComponentCode IN ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '1A', '1B', '1C', '1H') AND ac2.MarineCandidateId = ac1.MarineCandidateId AND ac2.OrgId = ac1.OrgId)
--RESERVIST MINUS DUPLICATE NWA'S FOR THE SAME CANIDATE INSERT INTO #FilteredCandidateInfo SELECT * FROM #ALLCandidateInfo ac1 WHERE O.cerComponentCode IN ('1E') AND ac1.ContractBeginDate = (SELECT MIN(ContractBeginDate) FROM #ALLCandidateInfo ac2 WHERE ac2.O.cerComponentCode IN ('1E') AND ac2.MarineCandidateId = ac1.MarineCandidateId AND ac2.OrgId = ac1.OrgId)
-- Get only SMCR Reserves SELECT fci.NwaRowGuid, fci.MarineCandidateId, fci.CandidateName, fci.ContractBeginDate, fci.O.cerComponentCode, fci.NwaId, fci.OrgId, fci.SchoolGuid, fci.CollegeName, fci.MissionYearOfContract, fci.CollegePro.leID, fci.SMCRReserveUnitID, fci.Organiza.onID, fci.FiscalYear INTO #SmcrCandidateInfo FROM #FilteredCandidateInfo fci INNER JOIN [Prospec.ng].[USMC].[Prospect] prospect ON prospect.[NwaId] = fci.NwaRowGuid INNER JOIN [Prospec.ng].[USMC].[O.cerProspectPac] opac ON opac.[ProspectId] = prospect.[ProspectId] WHERE opac.[InReserves] = 'true'
SELECT NwaRowGuid, MarineCandidateId, CandidateName, ContractBeginDate, O.cerComponentCode, NwaId, OrgId, SchoolGuid, CollegeName, MissionYearOfContract, CollegePro.leID, SMCRReserveUnitID, Organiza.onID, FiscalYear FROM #SmcrCandidateInfo
--- CLEAN UP
DROP TABLE #ALLCandidateInfo DROP TABLE #FilteredCandidateInfo DROP TABLE #SmcrCandidateInfo DROP TABLE #Withdrawals
SET NOCOUNT OFF
